comment._content:
Jimmy Nail's "Big River" start playing in my head when I see this one.
Very fine picture! greetings from Hanko, Finland

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Obviously 'doing their bit' at this dreadfull time and releasing men to go to the killing fields of France.  Still, a wonderfull old picture.
